properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 7:22PM CST until February 12 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tombigbee River at Amory.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* from Monday February 10 until Wednesday February 12.
* At 6 PM Saturday the stage was...17.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 23.4 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Monday February 10 and
continue to rise to near 23.4 feet by Tuesday February 11. The
river may fall below flood stage by Wednesday February 12.
* At 23.0 feet...Most lowland and farm land near the river is
flooded. Equipment and livestock may need to be moved to higher
ground.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
